question: As a Cloud Solutions Architect with extensive expertise in Infrastructure as Code and cloud automation, how interested are you in expanding your capabilities to include Multi-Cloud Management and Orchestration to further optimize our hybrid cloud environments?
options: Not interested; I prefer to focus solely on my core responsibilities.
Slightly interested; I would consider it if required by a project.
Moderately interested; I would dedicate personal time to self-study on a new adjacent tool.
Very interested; I would actively seek out training and opportunities to apply new complementary skills.
